questions.question: While working with Amazon Bedrock, you need to frequently update your knowledge base with new company policies. What is the most efficient way to handle this?
options: Fine-tuning the model every time a policy changes.
Manually adding new policies to the LLM's training dataset.
Using SageMaker Canvas to modify the model.
Updating the vector database used for Retrieval‑Augmented Generation (RAG).
correct_answers: Updating the vector database used for Retrieval‑Augmented Generation (RAG).
